title.value: Эффективность кормления рыбопосадочного материала карпа при низких плотностях посадки
Effectiveness of feeding the carp stock material under the low density stock conditions

journal.title: Belarus Fish Industry Problems : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Gadlevskaya, N.N., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus). Institute for Fish Industry
Radko, D.E., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus). Institute for Fish Industry

abstract.value: Producing of marketable fish directly depends on provision of fisheries with high quality stocking material. Technology of intensive growing of stocking material supposes receiving of fish larvae with standard average mass of 25 g and with fishery characteristics from 9,6 up to 15,2 centner per hectare. The article contains the results of growing of the large carp breeding material. It is determined that the use of different quality feeds for feeding allows for easier growing potency implementation, obtaining larger underyearlings in the terms of weight, with lower feed costs as compared with intensive growing methods. The norms of feeding of carp fingerlings, received through natural and artificial spawning, are calculated. The main advantages of the use of fry compound feeds are enumerated; average growth of live weight of carp fingerlings along with economic efficiency of compound feeds utilization is analyzed.
